about_the_game:
YOUR MISSION:

Uncover the mysteries behind this deadly new strain of virus, dubbed SCS-α (Synthetic Conversion Syndrome). Explore dark interiors, subterranean apertures and terrifying landscapes as you confront or flee from eldritch monsters, spawned from experiments on a plethora of organisms now reduced to hive creatures.

Disturbing revelations may reveal themselves as remnants of the Terran Coalition embark on a suicide mission to unveil the plot behind the madness.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Crafting System - Loot your enemies as you go for raw materials, these materials can then be used to craft an array of weapons and replenish ammunition supplies.

  • Fixed Cameras - Carefully placed static cameras to add the immersion and tension as your explore.

  • No HUD - The absence of HUD allows you to fully immerse yourself in the games environments, enjoy a more cinematic experience.

  • Dual Control Scheme - Separate control scheme for aiming states; the character will always look towards the cursor while aiming, allowing the player to strafe with the keyboard. The character will navigate using classic tank controls when in a neutral state.

  • Unlockable content - Additional content can be unlocked upon completion.

  • Stalker - You will be pursued during your mission, run or fight at your own peril.

  • Puzzles - Use logic to cipher your way through designated areas.

The future looks bleak as this virus sweeps across the cosmos and indiscriminately consumes all forms of life in it's path. With no end in sight, survival is not guaranteed...

Can you survive?

content_descriptors.notes: Conversion Strain contains content not appropriate for all ages; frequent violence or gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel I5-3570k
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Corei5-12400F / AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1660 Super / AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Your mission is to investigate the origins of a deadly new strain of virus; named SCS (Synthetic Conversion Syndrome), created to subjugate all living things. Fight your way through hordes of eldritch monsters as sinister revelations reveal themselves.
